alert.note: Alert for Sherman; Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 10:12PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Thomas and northeastern Sherman Counties through 1000 PM MDT/1100 PM CDT/... At 909 PM MDT/1009 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Brewster, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and locally heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. The National Weather Service in Goodland measured a 43 mph wind gust at 855 pm MDT. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Thomas and northeastern Sherman Counties, including the following locations... Edson. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 21 and 39. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Sudden, gusty winds and brief heavy rainfall with this storm may lead to hazardous driving conditions on area roads, including Interstate 70. Drivers are urged to slow down and exercise additional caution.
